millsfield:images_texts:
ВСРА
LEADS THE WAY
ACROSS THE PACIFIC WITH
THE
Douglas
"DC 6'"
VEC
*
Brtish Commonwealth Pacife Airlines Lit

MOST Flight - Tested
AIRLINER NOW FLYING!
A distance equal to 24 times around the world -
- that's the
amazing pre-service flight-test record of the DC-6 - newest
and finest Douglas of them all!
The magnificent teamwork of Douglas and leading airlines
made it possible to perfect this airplane. Douglas engineers
1200 of them
and airline experts began and stuck to
the most exhaustive
and
unusual flight-proving program
ever experienced by an airliner.
All told, the DC-6 embodies millions of
man-hours on the
part of Douglas engineers, technicians and craftsmen. Over
2000 hours were devoted to flight tests alone.
And months
were spent by airline personnel testing the DC-6, under all
operating conditions,
over the
routes
it now flies
mercially.
Yet, our responsibility for the DC-6 here at Douglas is just
beginning. As with the other great Douglas airplanes
the
DC-3s and DC-4s -
we shall
continue at all times to
work
closely with the airlines on all
problems of operation, main-
tenance
and
service in
the
field.
-BRITISH COMMONWEALTH™
CRUISING
SPEED
_ MORE THAN 300 MPH. AVERAGE
RANGE - 2000 MILES WITH FULL PAYLOAD OF OVER
14.000 POUNDS. MAINTAINS FLIGHT ON ANY TWO EN-
GINES. COMPLETE AIRCONDITIONING, RADIANT HEAT-
ING, AUTOMATICALLY "PRESSURIZED" CABIN AT ALL
ALTITUDES.
DOUGLAS
Douglas Aircraft Co., Inc., Santa Monica, Calif., U.S.A.
properties.sfomuseum:description: Brochure issued by British Commonwealth Pacific Airlines (BCPA), promoting Douglas DC-6 fleet; blue and white cover with text, “BCPA leads the way across the Pacific with the Douglas ‘DC-6’”; contains description of aircraft features with seating diagram.
